message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While I believe the product is worth significantly more, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This feels like a fair compromise. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly reach an agreement at $10,500?
